channel.title: I will make forums if you're too lazy
channel.description:
I have been critized for this already, so please don't flame me.
Okay, if you don't want to make your own forums I wll make them for you if you want me to. It is easy, but some people just don't have time. They will be hosted through www.smfforfree.com.
Current forums I am working with:
1.pko's forums 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8 9.
Finished Forums: - - - - - - - -
Here is the application to fill out for me to make you a forum:
[code] Forum Name: http://www.____________.smfforfree3.com Name to make Admin for you: Colors: Any Other Details?: [/code]
Thanks, Link

item.title: I will make forums if you're too lazy
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

Cpanel is the best site control pannel there is. Really easy to use (if you have a website). I would recomend it to anyone.

Just to install forums, all you have to do is upload the .zip. all cpanel hosts host zip and rar. (all winrar archives)
If you need a hand with anthing related to cpanel anyone. just pm me as i am really good with it.

Read full topic
item.source: I will make forums if you're too lazy

item.title: I will make forums if you're too lazy
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:4, topic:95996”]Let’s see what’ll happen if tell him this:

If I give you CPanel access, will you be able to set up forums without using Fantastico?[/quote]
i can, i can give you phpbb vbulletin, smf. PM me

Read full topic

item.title: I will make forums if you're too lazy
item.dc:creator: @para para`
item.description:
@para wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:9, topic:95996”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=138585.msg1333831#msg1333831 date=1179471471]

What is that supposed to mean? I’m using SMF For Free…

If you don’t know how to use CPanel and what it’s for, you fail @ internets.

Cpanel. It’s the control panel and you use to incorporate many things into your forums that “advanced” forum owners like to do to spice up the forums and it’s a useful tool… No need to be an ass io9…
[/quote]
I have an offbeat repute just for that.[quote author=io9 link=topic=138585.msg1332941#msg1332941 date=1179461652]
Let’s see what’ll happen if tell him this:

If I give you CPanel access, will you be able to set up forums without using Fantastico?
[/quote].[/quote]
Why, do you think that you’re so fucking l33t because you know what cPanel is?

Read full topic
